text:
## How to manage meeting status of assessment meeting?

The learners have an assessment meeting task "Oral Questioning Session" in
this course. John would like to update meeting status for learners.

Let’s see how John will manage meeting status of assessment meeting in
Curricula.

1\. In Curricula, John clicks**Result** on the left navigation pane, and then
clicks **Tasks**.

2\. He finds the assessment task "Oral Questioning Session" for "Class A" and
opens it.

3\. In the **Mark score** section, John can see the meeting status of each
learner. He can select one or more learners and click **Manage meeting
status** , and then selects **Manage meeting status of selected learners**. He
can also select **Manage meeting status for all learners** to update meeting
status of all learners.

4\. In the **Manage meeting status** window, he selects a new meeting status
for the selected learners. He can also update meeting status for all learners.

Note the following:

• If the meeting status is **Overdue** , it cannot be updated to **Not
started** or **Completed**.

• If the meeting status have been updated to **Overdue** or **Completed** , it
cannot be updated again.
